author: newsr.in
title: News24.com | 107 dead in crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque
text: A towering construction crane toppled over during a violent rainstorm in the Saudi city of Mecca, Islam's holiest site, crashing into the Grand Mosque and killing at least 107 people ahead of the start of the annual hajj pilgrimage later this month. Â»
